pages.title: Eclipse Phantom
pages.text: $(void)Eclipse Phantom$()$(br)Ghostly entities that haunt the night. They float through the air and inflict the $(l)Starless Night$() debuff on hit.$(br2)$(l)Spawns:$() Overworld (night), all Lunar Realm biomes$(br)$(l)Drops:$() Shadow Essence

pages.title: Void Walker
pages.text: $(void)Void Walker$()$(br)Tall, slender creatures that teleport erratically. Hard to pin down in combat.$(br2)$(l)Spawns:$() Dark areas, Lunar Realm$(br)$(l)Drops:$() Void Shard, Ender Pearl

pages.title: Corrupted Golem
pages.text: $(void)Corrupted Golem$()$(br)Once guardians of the Lunar Realm, now twisted by dark energy. Slow but extremely powerful.$(br2)$(l)Spawns:$() Underground (Y<50), Lunar Forest, Eclipse Wastes$(br)$(l)Drops:$() Corrupted Core, Moonstone
